title: New Map
body: This new map, will be better than the older one, in terms of FPS?

replies.body: It will be the same or better FPS
yeah,i am getting better FPS on PBE with the new map.

Mostly improved I'm assuming due to reduced noise and removal of a lot of excess detail that wasn't really necessary. I would credit it almost entirely to the art team learning all sorts of crazy new techniques to make less look like a whole lot more. Good job Riot.
It should be as good or better than what you were seeing before.
Nice work RIOT, for the amazing job!!! Keep going!
This new map will be release in season finalle?
I had improved fps on the updated SR by about +15 to +20.
